gpt-4-0314.name: Excellent
gpt-4-0314.description: Translation performed using gpt-4-0314, which provides higher accuracy but slower speed and higher cost. (This model is invitation-only and requires being added to the GPT-4 waitlist).

gpt-3.5-turbo.name: Optimal
gpt-3.5-turbo.description: Translation performed using gpt-3.5-turbo, offering a balanced choice between price and quality.

gpt-3.5-turbo-economy.name: Economy
gpt-3.5-turbo-economy.description: Translation performed using gpt-3.5-turbo without sending context, resulting in lower cost but lower translation quality. Some sentences may require manual correction.

key.name: API Key
key.description: You can obtain your API key at https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys. You can add multiple keys to enhance translation speed.

host.name: API Host
host.description: This is typically used for bypassing restrictions. If you're unsure about this, please keep the default value.

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.name: Edit prompt for "{{name}}"
prompt.description: The prompt used with ChatGPT. You can modify the prompt here. Additionally, {{lang}} is used to specify the language, and {{additional}} is used for additional notes. These fields will be automatically filled in during translation. When modifying the prompt, please make sure to keep these fields intact.

reset.title: Reset
reset.name: Reset all settings
reset.prompt: This will clear all settings, including the prompt, API keys, and language settings. Are you sure you want to reset?

about.title: About
about.author: Developer
about.buy_me_a_coffee_description: If this project has been helpful to you, please consider buying me a cup of coffee. It will motivate me to continue the development further.
